_header: Anon tho the Emperor Constantine had his false gods forsake
Note: For the usual Life, quite distinct from this, see 4764.
Subjects: Sylvester, saints, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St Sylvester, in one MS of the South English Legendary — in couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Anon þo þe emperour constauntin hadde his false goddus
                    forsake& þorwȝ siluestris lore hadde cristindom I
                    take…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& þer wonye wit outen ende to oure ryȝt
                    eritage& for ȝiue oure sinnus alle þat we habbeþ I don
                    outrage
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 388-94.
